name: Shawn
info: A Sinner adept at supporting allies. Energy Recovery Speed increases by 10%.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Deceptive Love
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: New Exclusive Ultimate [Deceptive Love]. Shawn applies [Weakspot] mark to an enemy once every 2 seconds, prioritizing those closest to her unmarked with [Weakspot]. This effect lasts for #6 / 8 / 10 seconds#. [Deceptive Love] has a 15-second cooldown after each use and can only be used twice per battle.

guide.title: Pull Advice
guide.text:
**Weakspot team's enabler. You must have her to make Bianca shine.**
Extremely recommended to level for players who have Bianca leveled. Bianca, the carry of Weakspot team, cannot actually apply Weakspot herself. Shawn is the best Weakspot-applying unit, hence her value in the team.

guide.title: Shackles
guide.text:
**S0** - Shawn functions fully at S0, which you can obtain for free by completing Day 1 of Bianca's [Perfect Vote] event.

**S2** - Extends the duration of her P1, which can help with managing Weakspot stacks.

guide.title: Notable Synergies
guide.text:
**Bianca â˜…**
Bianca makes use of Shawn's constant Weakspot applications to do huge amounts of damage.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Inversion
crimebrandSets.note: Generates energy so Shawn can Ult as much as possible to apply Weakspot for Bianca.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Hope + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Standard energy set so Shawn can have her first Ult up as quickly as possible.

crimebrandSets.name: Justice + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Buff the whole team's Attack by 5% whenever Shawn Ults.

crimebrandSets.name: Afterglow + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Boosts nearby allied Sinners' Attack by 10% after Shawn uses Ult. Although the Attack increase provided is larger than Justice, Afterglow has a 20s cooldown and does not apply mapwide, making it more difficult to use.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: At the start of the battle, Shawn gains 10 energy.

skills.name: Heartbreak
skills.description: Shawn attacks with energy, dealing (Attack * 80%) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Online Romance
skills.description: Shawn deals (Attack * 450%) Physical Damage to all enemies within the skill range, applying a [Weakspot] mark to them. [Online Romance] can be charged up to 2 times.

skills.name: Infatuation
skills.description:
After hitting an enemy with [Online Romance], the enemy receives the [Fascination] effect for #3# seconds.
[Fascination]: When a [Weakspot] mark is removed, it will be reapplied.

skills.name: Solace of Love
skills.description: When an allied Sinner applies a [Weakspot] mark, Shawn enables all allied Sinners to recover HP equal to (Attack * 60%). This effect can be triggered up to once every second.

criminalRecord:
The subject, a local Eastsider, was once a moderately famous voice actor and participated in related audition and entertainment shows. Following a scandal about her harassment of her colleague, she's disappeared from public view but continues running her frauds on the internet, posing a significant threat to society. Detention is recommended.

--

Since her detention by the MBCC, the subject's personal device and social media accounts have been confiscated and her internet access is strictly limited. Under Chief's supervision, she has come clean with the victims of her online dating frauds. So far, there have not been new victims.
mutationAssessment: +++* Ability Summary By transmitting sound waves through the device, she can seize affection from specific individuals, leaving them in severe despair and depression, and even rendering them completely dysfunctional in extreme cases. The subject will absorb the extracted affection and receive a boost to her mood and power. +++* Awakening Signs After being, as she claims, betrayed by someone she loved, the subject attempted revenge, only to be ridiculed and cursed. Upon realizing the love had always been one-sided, her special power awakened. +++* Corruption State The subject shows only mild signs of corruption and no physical abnormalities. However, having stayed mostly at home and devoted almost all of her energy to cultivating her online relationships, her mental state is poor and requires close monitoring.
ecbFlavourText:
"Who should be chosen today?"
"This one...? Or this one?"

Heh, in a way, I guess my dreams have come true. But this voice that my followers adore, I don't like it at all.

voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: I've sent the words "I like you" to many, many people. But strangely, when I text you, I always type them in and delete them over and over again... I don't know what's stopping me from sending them to you. Perhaps, in my heart of hearts, I want you to hear it from my mouth.

arrestRec1: The subject first encountered Chief during the Gray Mirror incident and harassed Chief persistently over the following months. Ultimately, Chief personally led a team to detain the Sinner.
arrestRec2: Coming from a middle-class family in Eastside, she befriended a female neighbor when she was young. As adults, they trained together as voice actors and participated in a voice acting audition. The subject's charming voice and appearance won her a decent place in the audition.
arrestRec3: During a live performance on the audition, she suddenly announced her withdrawal. Subsequently, her "friend," who was also a fellow contestant, went onstage and accused her of long-term harassment. She attempted to defend herself but was rendered speechless. The accusation ruined her reputation, while her "friend" capitalized on the fame brought by the incident and won the contest.
arrestRec4: The subject later hid her identity and blended in with her "friend's" fans. Leveraging her knowledge of this "friend," the subject successfully approached her and started an online relationship with her under a false name. After confessing her true identity, the subject was ridiculed, which awakened her special power. A few days later, the "friend" committed suicide due to depression.
servingTerm1: The subject maintains dozens of social media accounts and over a hundred online romantic relationships. Her prey spans a wide range and comes from all age groups and professions.
servingTerm2: The subject used to live a reclusive life in a rented apartment. She seldom exercised and had an irregular routine and a monotonous diet. This has resulted in her pale complexion, physical weakness, malnourishment, and liver and kidney issues.
servingTerm3: The subject frequently shows an unusual interest in the Bureau's staff and Sinners. She's repeatedly attempted to chat them up and ask for their contact information, but all in vain.
servingTerm4: Recently, the subject's interest has noticeably shifted to Chief. Besides the usual bombardment of online interactions, she always tries her best to get Chief's attention when they meet, openly engaging in physical contact. Typically, such behaviors are met with an over-the-shoulder throw by Chief.
emotionCheck1:
[Shawn is grumpily refreshing her terminal and looking at the no internet connection notification that keeps appearing.]


**Shawn:** Wasn't it supposed to be back by 3 p.m.? There's still no signal. Doesn't this affect the Bureau's operations?

**Chief:** ......


* **Prompt:** It's rare to see you so concerned about the Bureau's operations.
 * **Shawn:** You work here, of course I'd pay more attention. Nothing surprising.
 * **Shawn:** ğŸ˜


* **Prompt:** The maintenance is extended by 2 hours. The notice has been posted in the cafeteria.
  * **Shawn:** Offline notice? No one took a photo and uploaded it to the intranet forum? Right, the internet is down... Damn it...
 * **Shawn:** ğŸ˜«
supervision1:
++* âš  Narrow Defeat

//It's time to select a movie for movie night again.//

**System Notifications:** Whenever it's time to select a movie for the movie night, Shawn always casts her vote for her favorite horror movies, but alas, horror movies always lose by a few votes to other genres.

* **Prompt:** Wish her success next time
supervision2:
++* âš  New Profile Picture

//Recently, many staff members have changed their work profile pictures.//

**System Notifications:** Recently, many staff members in the Bureau have changed their profile pictures. These pictures are all quite similar in style, and they never show their whole faces in these pictures, giving off a mysterious vibe. It turns out they all asked Shawn to edit them.

* **Prompt:** I want one too.
supervision3:
++* âš  Voice Acting Performance

//Shawn also performs at this gathering.//

**System Notifications:** Shawn, at everyone's request, also performs a dubbing act on Stage at the gathering. She played multiple roles single-handedly, earning a room full of admiration and applause.

* **Prompt:** That's amazing!
supervision4:
++* âš âš  Consensus

//Passing by the secret room, you overhear two logistics staff having a secret discussion.//

**System Notifications:** Passing by the secret room, you overhear two logistics department staff members having a secret discussion.

**Chief:** What are they so excited about?

* **Prompt:** Listen

**Staff A:** I still want to choose Eleven.

**Staff B:** But I think Shawn's voice is more attractive!

**Staff A:** Whenever I'm upset or facing some trouble, I just listen to Eleven's radio show for a bit.

**Staff A:** Eleven really has a gentle and pleasant voice! My mood brightens up every time I hear her voice!

**Staff B:** But who could resist Shawn? I really love that slightly husky and deep voice!

**Staff B:** She could have everyone swooning over her with just a few wordsâ€¦

**Staff A:** Hmmâ€¦

**Staff A:** But why do we have to choose?

**Staff B:** Huh?

**Staff A:** We can like both their voices!

**Staff A:** We can like both their voices!

**Staff B:** Right, you have a point! Why didn't I think of that!

**Chief:** â€¦
emotionCheck2:
[Shawn starts to frequently check her phone again, quickly replying to each message as it arrives.] 

**Shawn:** "That's not true, sweetie. They just have poor tastes, that's why they don't cherish you." ...Phew, she's finally feeling better. I didn't expect there to be so many people longing for love inside the Bureau.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** You're both in the Bureau. Do you really have to talk online? 
 * **Shawn:** The love that travels through the internet and screens is unique. It's purer, less constrained... Would you like to try? 
 * **Shawn:** ğŸ˜˜


* **Prompt:** You're both in the Bureau. What if she finds out about your "habit" and comes beat you up?
 * **Shawn:** This won't happen in a relationship nurtured by sincere love. And if it makes the other person happy... I'm more than willing to offer myself. 
 * **Shawn:** ğŸ˜‰
supervision5:
++* âš âš âš  Hydrate

//You receive a voice message from Shawn.//

**System Notifications:** Today, while taking a stroll in the Bureau, you receive a voice message from Shawn on your terminal.

* **Prompt:** Play

**Shawn:** A quick reminderâ€”the temperature's really gone up. Be sure to drink plenty of water to stay cool and avoid heatstroke.

**Chief:** ...Being thoughtful, huh.

**Chief:** â€¦ It's been quite hot lately. The heat always leaves you feeling thirsty. The Recreation Area is just ahead; You decide to get some water from there.

**System Notifications:** When you enter the Recreation Area, you see Shawn on the couch, chatting with several people on multiple phones.
When you greet her, she hastily says "Just a moment" and then dives back into her phones.

**Shawn:** Haha, how could I ever find you annoying? I want to know everything about you.

**Shawn:** Do you know? You're the most special one to me.

**Shawn:** Hmm. I'll be here whenever you need me.

**Shawn:** ...

**Chief:** She's really busy...

**System Notifications:** While getting water, you notice Shawn clearing her throat before sending a voice message, her voice sounding a bit hoarse.

**Chief:** Is she thirsty?

**System Notifications:** You mumble, then look back at her. Her chapped lips seem to confirm your guess.

**Chief:** You mumble, then look back at her. Her chapped lips seem to confirm your guess.

* **Prompt:** Get her a cup of water too

**Chief:** And here you are reminding me to stay hydrated. Your voice has turned hoarse.

**Chief:** Here, have some water.

**System Notifications:** You offer the water to Shawn, but she simply stares at your hand with a complex expression.

**Shawn:** ...l don't drink anything that's handed to me.

**Chief:** Ah...

**System Notifications:** You then remember that Shawn has never accepted water, beverages, or soup handed to her; she only drinks water boiled from her own kettle.

* **Prompt:** Withdraw your hand
 * **Chief:** Sorry. I forgot about that.
 * **Chief:** I noticed your voice wasn't quite right and your lips were chapped, so I thought you might need to hydrate...
 * **Chief:** Remember to boil some water for yourself later.

* **Prompt:** Explain
 * **Chief:** Don't worry, the water is from that dispenser over there. No one would dare mess with the drinking water in the Bureau, so it's safe.
 * **Shawn:** ...
 * **System Notifications:** She stares at the cup in your hand for a long time, your arm getting sore from holding it. In the end, she finally takes the cup from your hand and hesitantly takes a sip.
 * **Chief:** That's right. Drinking more water is good for you.
